message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you a great product that I think would be very valuable to you. I'm asking for $11,000.  What do you think?
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I think that's a fair price considering the value the product will bring to me.
Bob, I understand your position, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me.  How about we meet in the middle at $10,250?
I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. I'm trying to be reasonable, but I really need to stay within my budget.
